item.title: 10 Vim Plugins for Writers
item.description: I still remember the first time I came in contact with Vim; it was during my very first job. It was a part-time gig in a government office. A few months in, they decided to go open-source full in. Out the window went Windows and in came Linux. At the time, I was doing PHP development, and I was sorry to have to let go of my dear Dreamweaver. I decided that if I had to work on Linux, I would go all the way, no compromises for me.
